sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的職業道德是與黨和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: It was my good fortune to be linked with Madame Curie through twenty years of sublime and unclouded friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我幸運地同居裏夫人有20年崇高而真摯的友誼。

sentences.english: His realm of thought is lofty.
sentences.chinese: 他的思想境界非常崇高。

sentences.english: This international award has set the seal on a long and distinguished career.
sentences.chinese: 這項國際獎的授予是對一項長久而崇高的事業的肯定。

sentences.english: In the most lofty devotion we become unconscious of self.
sentences.chinese: 在最崇高的靈脩中，我們變得渾然不覺自我。

sentences.english: Please accept this little gift as my esteem for you.
sentences.chinese: 奉上這小小的禮物，以表達我對您的崇高敬意。

sentences.english: Thus it makes the human honored and lofty .
sentences.chinese: 這纔是人之爲人的尊貴與崇高。

sentences.english: A man in love in the most can show nature noble qualities.
sentences.chinese: 一個人在戀愛時最能表現出天性中崇高的品質。

sentences.english: Confucianism, the bore Qiu initiated the lofty spirit of morals docile.
sentences.chinese: 儒家，孔丘倡導了道德善良的崇高精神。

sentences.english: Of all the lofty practices, it is the most abused.
sentences.chinese: 這是所有崇高行爲中被濫用最多的。

sentences.english: Although there exists some differences between harmony and loftiness, there are still some connections.
sentences.chinese: 和諧與崇高儘管有一定的區別，但二者又有聯繫。

sentences.english: Tribunes enjoyed sancrosanct status and were personally above the law.
sentences.chinese: 保民官享有極崇高的地位，個人上高於法律。

sentences.english: What they did showed the greatest humaneness.
sentences.chinese: 他們的行爲顯示了最崇高的人道。

sentences.english: The article is divided into three parts:The first chapter is to analyze tendencies of Romanticism of Liang Shi Qiu's Literary Thought about sublimity .
sentences.chinese: 第一章是分析梁實秋浪漫主義傾向的崇高文藝思想。

sentences.english: One is the ultimate ideal, the highest objective-attainment of Buddhahood.
sentences.chinese: 一方面是究竟理想，最崇高目的是成佛。

sentences.english: "Primitive Crudity" style has been holding an important position in Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: “古拙”風格在中國繪畫史中享有崇高地位。

definition: to admire/to revere/to look up to

pinyin: shen2 sheng4 bu4 ke3 qin1 fan4
